content: {"locationId": "1434", "organizationId": "1307", "name": "Richland Bridge Community Serv", "address1": "5114 E Richland Ave", "address2": "", "city": "Chillicothe", "state": "IL", "zipCode": "61523", "country": null, "phone": "", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "40.8754828", "longitude": "-89.5109018", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Peoria County", "languages": "", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "", "notes": "We offer free clothing and shoes, and coats during winter months  We offer bedding,pillows,towels if a family has had a fire or other circumstances please speak to Director if this is a need you have.", "contactName": "Virginia Wilson", "contactPhone": "309-634-9355", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Grocery / Client Choice, Indoor Service, Lifting / Carrying Assistance", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 15, "regionName": "Peoria Area Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "0c157aa8-9c87-4df3-afb4-a24fdc9466ab.png", "website": "https://www.peoriafoodbank.org"}, {"regionId": 18, "regionName": "Eastern Illinois Foodbank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "c4ca618b-3da4-4f65-b8a9-98dec847f359.png", "website": "https://www.eifoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Thursday 9:00 AM-12:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
